summary: Mescaline is a special type of chemical found in nature, called a psychedelic protoalkaloid. It's similar to other substances like LSD and psilocybin, which can make people see or experience things that aren't really there (hallucinations). This substance is part of a group called phenethylamines and has a unique structure with three methoxy groups attached to its molecule. Mescaline is known for its powerful effects on the mind.
title: Mescaline
